variables.name: SYSTEM_APPS_ERROR_RECEIVER_PROPERTY
variables.comment: System property defining error report receiver for system apps

variables.name: DEFAULT_ERROR_RECEIVER_PROPERTY
variables.comment: System property defining default error report receiver

variables.name: TYPE_CRASH
variables.comment: * An error report about an application crash.

variables.name: TYPE_ANR
variables.comment: * An error report about an application that's not responding.

variables.name: TYPE_BATTERY
variables.comment: * An error report about an application that's consuming too much battery.

variables.name: TYPE_RUNNING_SERVICE
variables.comment:
* A report from a user to a developer about a running service that the
     * user doesn't think should be running.

variables.name: type
variables.comment:
* Type of this report. Can be one of {@link #TYPE_NONE},
     * {@link #TYPE_CRASH}, {@link #TYPE_ANR}, {@link #TYPE_BATTERY},
     * or {@link #TYPE_RUNNING_SERVICE}.

variables.name: installerPackageName
variables.comment:
* Package name of the application which installed the application this
     * report pertains to.
     * This identifies which market the application came from.

variables.name: time
variables.comment: * Time at which the error occurred.

variables.name: systemApp
variables.comment: * Set if the app is on the system image.

variables.name: crashInfo
variables.comment:
* If this report is of type {@link #TYPE_CRASH}, contains an instance
     * of CrashInfo describing the crash; otherwise null.

variables.name: anrInfo
variables.comment:
* If this report is of type {@link #TYPE_ANR}, contains an instance
     * of AnrInfo describing the ANR; otherwise null.

variables.name: batteryInfo
variables.comment:
* If this report is of type {@link #TYPE_BATTERY}, contains an instance
     * of BatteryInfo; otherwise null.

variables.name: runningServiceInfo
variables.comment:
* If this report is of type {@link #TYPE_RUNNING_SERVICE}, contains an instance
     * of RunningServiceInfo; otherwise null.

methods.name: public static ComponentName getErrorReportReceiver(Context context, String packageName, int appFlags)
static ComponentName getErrorReportReceiver(PackageManager pm, String errorPackage, String receiverPackage)
methods.comment:
* Return activity in receiverPackage that handles ACTION_APP_ERROR.
     *
     * @param pm PackageManager instance
     * @param errorPackage package which caused the error
     * @param receiverPackage candidate package to receive the error
     * @return activity component within receiverPackage which handles
     * ACTION_APP_ERROR, or null if not found

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
public void dump(Printer pw, String prefix)
methods.comment: * Dump the report to a Printer.

methodNames: public static ComponentName getErrorReportReceiver(Context context, String packageName, int appFlags)
static ComponentName getErrorReportReceiver(PackageManager pm, String errorPackage, String receiverPackage)
public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
public void dump(Printer pw, String prefix)
